articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: ETH 中文对话EthStorage 创始人 Qi Zhou：以太坊需要有一个存储层，而且是一个去中心化的、不需要对以太坊本身的协议进行升级的一个存储层，或者我们叫模块化的存储层来解决数据的长期保存问题。我们通过 EthStorage 使用的 ZK 加密技术，去保障 Layer2 数据提供的节点。

articles.description:
Re 据Beosin Alert监测，PolyNetwork攻击者已在以太坊上兑换了 5,196 ETH（约 1010 万美元）。由于流动性较低，攻击者可能无法兑现其他代币（约 2.6 亿美元）。https://twitter.com/BeosinAlert/status/1675773135755546625?s=20

Beosin Alert: @PolyNetwork2 exploiter has swapped a total of 5,196 $ETH (~$10.1M) on Ethereum.
Other tokens (~$260 million) may not be cashed out by the attacker due to low liqudity.
The fees for these addresses on Ethereum are from @Bybit_Official, @kucoincom, @FixedFloat, @ChangeNOW_io https://t.co/rTxIvY993P

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: 新加坡金融管理局要求加密货币平台在年底前将客户资金存放在信托中，还将推进一项禁止散户投资者借贷和质押的提议。并在声明中表示，“鉴于数字支付代币交易的极高风险和投机性质，仅靠监管无法保护消费者免受所有损失”，消费者在交易时必须继续“极其谨慎”。 （彭博社）https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-07-03/singapore-tells-crypto-platforms-to-keep-client-money-in-a-trust

如何用ChatGPT冲土狗?   
 AI + Web3 最实用功能, 被@etherscan 实现了. 打开网站, 找到 Code Reader 
配个OpenAI的Key,  然后找一个土狗合同, 地址粘贴进去,  让GPT分析代码有没有风险.   看不懂代码也没关系, 会打汉字就行.  明白了吗🫡

articles.description:
Re @hufhaus9 Devil is in the details. If blackrock doesn’t own BTC. But their clients own via blackrock 51% of the network, then a hardfork would make blackrock owner and give them choice 
https://twitter.com/jratcliff/status/1669937251286126592?s=46&t=cM-600GJga7XNxddNsm-Pw

John W. Ratcliff: There is a strange point with the wording in that BlackRock ETF about hard forks.
Traditionally, when a hard fork occurs, users get tokens on *both* forks. Large exchanges have generally honored this for custodial tokens.
However, that's not what the BlackRock ETF says. It says… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1669937251286126592

- **BIG** news - BlackRock is the world's largest asset manager
- It’s not going to happen
- BlackRock knows this
- Rather, it is sending a political message
- Larry Fink is a prominent Democrat
